channel.title: Junbin Huang on Junbin Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Junbin Huang on Junbin Huang

item.description:
(Micheal) Junbin Huang (黄俊斌)

Currently working as SDE in:

  • Amazon AWS EBS, Server team
  • Seattle, USA

Graduate from:

  • Johns Hopkins University

    • Department of Computer Science
    • Baltimore, MD 21218

  • Shanghai Jiao Tong University

    • Department of Electrical Engineering
    • Center for Brain-like Computing and Machine Intelligence
    • 800# Dongchuan Rd, Minhang Dist, Shanghai, China, 200240

Contact:

  • Email: huangjuibin(at)outlook(dot)com / jhuan129(at)jhu(dot)edu
  • WeChat: H413068712 or QR code

Hello/ 你好！

I am (Micheal) Junbin Huang, graduated from Shanghai Jiao Tong University, major in Electrical Power Engineering and Automation. Now I am taking my master degree of Computer Science in Johns Hopkins University working in Amazon AWS for the EBS Server Stats team! My main job is to develop an efficient data analysis (ETL) pipeline for our data scientist. This pipeline will boost jobs on analyzing the evaluate metrics on EBS servers performance and client experience.

In recent years, deep neural network have achieved great success in various domains, particularly in tasks in volving visual and speech information, leading to the wave of deep learning. Occasionally having access to Machine Learning and Data Mining, I found that I have been deeply attracted to the data world. So I am planning to apply for the master degree intern in Computer Science specified in Machine Learning / Data Science track or SDE in US. Recently most of my energy is spent on OCR and Anomaly/Outlier Detection related topics.

I was advised by Prof. Baoliang Lu working on Emotion Recognition during my undergraduate. I have taken the internship as Algorithm Engineer in Ctrip.com and as Data Scientist in the Data lab in Maxtropy Co.Ltd.

I am interestd in Machine Learning algorithm/application, Data Mining and Data Engineering.

Here is my curriculum vitae.

Please feel free to contact me via WeChat or Email.
Curriculum Vitae
